# exttools

Tools for analyzing ggplot2-related extension packages on CRAN and
GitHub. They might be useful in other cases as well.

Function writing leaned heavily on AI (ChatGPT 5.2). No formal testing.
Use at your own risk.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`build_archive_df()`](https://jtr13.github.io/exttools/reference/build_archive_df.md)
  : Build a lookup table of CRAN archive first appearance dates
- [`extract_github_repo()`](https://jtr13.github.io/exttools/reference/extract_github_repo.md)
  : Extract GitHub user and repository from text
- [`first_repo_commit()`](https://jtr13.github.io/exttools/reference/first_repo_commit.md)
  : Find the first commit in a GitHub repository
- [`get_components_cran()`](https://jtr13.github.io/exttools/reference/get_components_cran.md)
  : Extract ggplot2 grammar components from a CRAN package
- [`get_components_github()`](https://jtr13.github.io/exttools/reference/get_components_github.md)
  : Extract ggplot2 grammar components from a GitHub repository
- [`get_first_commit()`](https://jtr13.github.io/exttools/reference/get_first_commit.md)
  : Find the first GitHub commit introducing a symbol
- [`get_first_export()`](https://jtr13.github.io/exttools/reference/get_first_export.md)
  : Find the first commit where a function is exported
- [`get_first_release()`](https://jtr13.github.io/exttools/reference/get_first_release.md)
  : Get CRAN location and first release date for an R package
- [`github_pages_to_repo()`](https://jtr13.github.io/exttools/reference/github_pages_to_repo.md)
  : Convert GitHub Pages URLs to GitHub repository URLs
- [`in_grammar_check_cran()`](https://jtr13.github.io/exttools/reference/in_grammar_check_cran.md)
  : Classify CRAN package as in-grammar or other
- [`in_grammar_check_github()`](https://jtr13.github.io/exttools/reference/in_grammar_check_github.md)
  : Classify GitHub package as in-grammar or other
- [`which_dep_cran()`](https://jtr13.github.io/exttools/reference/which_dep_cran.md)
  : Classify ggplot2 dependency type for CRAN packages
- [`which_dep_github()`](https://jtr13.github.io/exttools/reference/which_dep_github.md)
  : Determine ggplot2 dependency for a GitHub package
